ch0652_68_sayoko/0101_0701_01_10:
We were destined to meet here today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0652_68_sayoko/0101_0701_02_10:
The timing of our next meeting has been
preordained as well... Eehehehee!
ch0652_68_sayoko/7101_0701_01_10:
Because Pasio is an artificial island, it seems there
haven’t been any hauntings spotted here yet...
ch0652_68_sayoko/7101_0701_02_10:
But did you know? Wherever people gather,
rumors appear.
ch0652_68_sayoko/7101_0701_03_10:
*chuckle* I’m looking forward to what Pasio’s
future holds...
ch0652_68_sayoko/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you believe in the supernatural,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0652_68_sayoko/7105_0701_02_10:
It’s OK if you don’t...but it would make me so
very happy if you were a true believer...
ch0652_68_sayoko/7105_0701_03_10:
I just wanted to...share my interests with you.
That’s all.
ch0652_68_sayoko/1701_0702_01_10: It was your destiny to accept my gift.
ch0652_68_sayoko/2501_0701_01_10:
You give off the aura of a main character...
If you were in a story, you’d be the protagonist.
ch0652_68_sayoko/2501_0701_02_10:
Usually, I don’t get along well with bright and
shiny personalities like yours. But you’re different...
ch0652_68_sayoko/2501_0702_01_10:
I can see your aura... It’s such a strong...gentle...
beautiful color...
ch0652_68_sayoko/2501_0702_02_10:
But for those who face you in battle, such an
unlucky color.
ch0652_68_sayoko/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning is a time of rebirth... Am I the same
person today as I was yesterday?
ch0652_68_sayoko/3003_0701_01_10:
Midday is when the sun shines brightest... The sun
and I are not the best of friends...
ch0652_68_sayoko/3005_0701_01_10:
Nighttime is when ghosts thrive... If you’re
frightened by them, you should think twice before
going out... *giggle*
